name: Equal

inputs.name: Tolerance
inputs.description: You can use Tolerance to set an equal range. When Tolerance is negative, and A is within [B-:Tolerance:, B+:Tolerance:], then the output is false. When Tolerance is positive, and A is within [B-:Tolerance:, B+:Tolerance:], then the output is true.

outputs.name: A==B?
outputs.description: If A and B are equal, this value is true. If they are not equal, this value is false.

description: Compare two inputs and check if they are equal. Supported types: Number, Boolean, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, Color, and String.
